Package net.jandie1505.playerlevels.api.core.level

Schnittstelle LevelingManager

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
LevelingManager
public interface LevelingManager
Manages the Levelers.

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    @NotNull CompletableFuture<Boolean>
    erasePlayerAsynchronously(@NotNull UUID playerUUID)
    Erases the player from the database and from the cache asynchronously.
    @Nullable Leveler
    getLeveler(@NotNull UUID playerUUID)
    Returns a cached leveler (player).
    Normally, a player has a leveler when the player is online.
    double
    getXPForLevel(int level)
    Returns the amount of xp for the specified level.
    double
    getXPForNextLevel(int currentLevel, int level)
    Returns the amount of xp required from the currentLevel to the level.
    @NotNull CompletableFuture<Leveler>
    loadLeveler(@NotNull UUID playerUUID)
    Loads a leveler when it does not exist in cache.
    Please note that the returned future is not completed in Bukkit's main thread, which means you have to do new BukkitRunnable() {}.runTask(plugin) to interact with Bukkit stuff like the player.

  • Methodendetails

    • getLeveler

      @Nullable @Nullable Leveler getLeveler(@NotNull @NotNull UUID playerUUID)
      Returns a cached leveler (player).
      Normally, a player has a leveler when the player is online.
      Parameter:
      playerUUID - player uuid
      Gibt zurück:
      leveler (or null if not cached)

    • loadLeveler

      @NotNull @NotNull CompletableFuture<Leveler> loadLeveler(@NotNull @NotNull UUID playerUUID)
      Loads a leveler when it does not exist in cache.
      Please note that the returned future is not completed in Bukkit's main thread, which means you have to do new BukkitRunnable() {}.runTask(plugin) to interact with Bukkit stuff like the player.
      Parameter:
      playerUUID - player uuid
      Gibt zurück:
      future of leveler

    • erasePlayerAsynchronously

      @NotNull @NotNull CompletableFuture<Boolean> erasePlayerAsynchronously(@NotNull @NotNull UUID playerUUID)
      Erases the player from the database and from the cache asynchronously.
      Parameter:
      playerUUID - player uuid
      Gibt zurück:
      success (as a future)

    • getXPForLevel

      double getXPForLevel(int level) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException, ArithmeticException
      Returns the amount of xp for the specified level.
      Parameter:
      level - level
      Gibt zurück:
      xp
      Löst aus:
      NullPointerException - when the xp formula is not set
      IllegalArgumentException - when the formula is not valid
      ArithmeticException - when the formula contains a division by zero

    • getXPForNextLevel

      double getXPForNextLevel(int currentLevel, int level) throws NullPointerException, IllegalArgumentException, ArithmeticException
      Returns the amount of xp required from the currentLevel to the level.
      Parameter:
      currentLevel - start
      level - target
      Gibt zurück:
      required xp
      Löst aus:
      NullPointerException - when the xp formula is not set
      IllegalArgumentException - when the formula is not valid
      ArithmeticException - when the formula contains a division by zero
